name: @deployable/page
description: Page layout and component testing with Webdriver.io

scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover _mocha test/unit* test/int* && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing --access public
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags

author: Matt Hoyle <code atat deployable.co>
